title: Hydrogel Electrolyte with Electron/Ion Dual Regulation Mechanism for Highly Reversible Flexible Zinc Batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03067B, Paper
Fusheng Luo, Song Yang, Qing Wu, Yue Li, Jinlong Zhang, Yanhui Zhang, Jun Huang, Haibo Xie, Yiwang Chen
Hydrogel electrolytes have been extensively developed for flexible zinc-ion batteries (FZIBs) owing to their rich ion transfer channels, mechanical stability and intrinsic safety. However, the single ion regulation in traditional...
